009
010package Ch13_Color_Images;
011
012import ij.IJ;
013import ij.ImagePlus;
014import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
015import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
016import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
017import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
018import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
019import imagingbook.common.color.quantize.ColorQuantizer;
020import imagingbook.common.color.quantize.KMeansClusteringQuantizer;
021import imagingbook.common.color.quantize.MedianCutQuantizer;
022import imagingbook.common.color.quantize.OctreeQuantizer;
023import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
024import imagingbook.core.jdoc.JavaDocHelp;
025import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
026
027import java.util.Locale;
028
029import static imagingbook.common.color.quantize.KMeansClusteringQuantizer.DefaultIterations;
030import static imagingbook.common.color.quantize.KMeansClusteringQuantizer.InitialClusterMethod.MostFrequent;
031import static imagingbook.common.color.quantize.KMeansClusteringQuantizer.InitialClusterMethod.Random;
032import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
033
034/**
035 * <p>
036 * ImageJ plugin, performs Median Cut color quantization using {@link MedianCutQuantizer}. See Sec. 13.4.2 (Algs.
037 * 13.1-3) of [1] for details.
038 * </p>
039 * <p>
040 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer
041 * (2022).
042 * </p>
043 *
044 * @author WB
045 * @version 2022/11/05
046 */
047public class Quantize_Color_Image implements PlugInFilter, JavaDocHelp {
048        
049        enum QuantizeMethod {
050                MedianCut,
051                Octree,
052                OctreeQuick,
053                KMeansRandom,
054                KMeansMostFrequent
055        }
056        
057        private static QuantizeMethod METHOD = QuantizeMethod.MedianCut;
058        private static int NCOLORS = 16;
059        private static boolean CREATE_INDEXED_IMAGE = true; 
060        private static boolean CREATE_RGB_IMAGE = false;
061        private static boolean LIST_COLOR_MAP = false;
062        
063        private ImagePlus im;
064
065        /**
066         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image is currently open.
067         */
068        public Quantize_Color_Image() {
069                if (noCurrentImage()) {
070                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.Flower);
071                }
072        }
073        
074        @Override
075        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
076                this.im = im;
077                return DOES_RGB + NO_CHANGES;
078        }
079        
080        @Override
081        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
082                
083                if (!runDialog())
084                        return;
085                
086                ColorProcessor cp = (ColorProcessor) ip;
087                ColorQuantizer quantizer = makeQuantizer((int[])cp.getPixels());
088                
089                int nCols = quantizer.getColorMap().length;
090                
091                String title = im.getShortTitle() + "-" + METHOD.toString();
092                
093                if (CREATE_INDEXED_IMAGE) {
094                        // quantize to an indexed color image
095                        ByteProcessor qip = quantizer.quantize(cp);
096                        ImagePlus imp = new ImagePlus(title + "-IDX-" + nCols, qip);
097                        imp.setTypeToColor256();
098                        imp.show();
099                }
100                
101                if (CREATE_RGB_IMAGE) {
102                        // quantize to a full-color RGB image
103                        int[] rgbPix = quantizer.quantize((int[])cp.getPixels());
104                        ColorProcessor rgbIp = new ColorProcessor(cp.getWidth(), cp.getHeight(), rgbPix);
105                        ImagePlus imp = new ImagePlus(title + "-RGB-" + nCols , rgbIp);
106                        imp.show();
107                }
108                
109                if (LIST_COLOR_MAP) {
110                        listColorMap(quantizer);
111                }
112        }
113        
114        private ColorQuantizer makeQuantizer(int[] pixels) {
115                switch (METHOD) {
116                case MedianCut: 
117                        return new MedianCutQuantizer(pixels, NCOLORS);
118                case Octree: 
119                        return new OctreeQuantizer(pixels, NCOLORS, false);
120                case OctreeQuick: 
121                        return new OctreeQuantizer(pixels, NCOLORS, true);
122                case KMeansRandom: 
123                        return new KMeansClusteringQuantizer(pixels, NCOLORS, Random, DefaultIterations);
124                case KMeansMostFrequent: 
125                        return new KMeansClusteringQuantizer(pixels, NCOLORS, MostFrequent, DefaultIterations);
126                }
127                return null;
128        }
129
130        public void listColorMap(ColorQuantizer quantizer) {
131                float[][] colormap = quantizer.getColorMap();
132                IJ.log("Quantized colors (r, g, b)");
133                int n = colormap.length;
134                for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
135                        float red = colormap[i][0];
136                        float grn = colormap[i][1];
137                        float blu = colormap[i][2];
138                        IJ.log(String.format(Locale.US, "  %3d: (%5.1f, %5.1f, %5.1f)", i, red, grn, blu));
139                }
140        }
141        
142        private boolean runDialog() {
143                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
144                gd.addHelp(getJavaDocUrl());
145                gd.addEnumChoice("Quantization method", METHOD);
146                gd.addNumericField("No. of colors (1,..,256)", NCOLORS, 0);
147                gd.addCheckbox("Create indexed color image", CREATE_INDEXED_IMAGE);
148                gd.addCheckbox("Create quantized RGB image", CREATE_RGB_IMAGE);
149                gd.addCheckbox("List quantized colors", LIST_COLOR_MAP);
150                
151                gd.showDialog();
152                if (gd.wasCanceled())
153                        return false;
154                
155                METHOD = gd.getNextEnumChoice(QuantizeMethod.class);
156                int nc = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
157                nc = Math.min(nc, 256);
158                nc = Math.max(1, nc);           
159                NCOLORS = nc;
160                CREATE_INDEXED_IMAGE = gd.getNextBoolean();
161                CREATE_RGB_IMAGE = gd.getNextBoolean();
162                LIST_COLOR_MAP = gd.getNextBoolean();
163                return true;
164        }
165}
